channel.title: PkScape F2P - Fast Rates - New things - Back Online Right now!
channel.description:
[center][b][size=24pt]Project PkScape F2P Online[/size][/b] [img]http://pkscapef2p.sytes.net/online.php[/img] [b]Downloadable Client Mirrors:[/b] http://uppit.com/6uzfbz0vjycn/PkScape_Client.zip http://www.speedyshare.com/files/30265981/PkScape_Client.zip http://uppit.com/n64e3ppdhlfc/Client.zip Set up to log in with any username and password, just login and start playing!
[url=http://pkscapef2p.sytes.net/index.php]Website Forums[/url] [url=http://pkscapef2p.sytes.net]Webclient Coming Soon[/url] [url=http://pkscapef2p.sytes.net/kdr.php]K/D Ratio Hiscores[/url]
[size=8pt](I'll be updating the thread whenever I do updates, everything below is updated as of September 09, 2011.)[/size]
Details: Developers: Me. msn: thedjinn123@hotmail.com Type? Pk Server F2P or P2P: F2P Wilderness Reduced by half Webclient: In Process of being made. EXP Rate: 200x (Meant to be easy). Max Stat: 99 Registration: Login with any Username & Password Master Fisher: Free Lobster Dueling?: It will stay added in, people like dueling. (So part p2p, dueling wise unless voted to be taken out.) Free Items: Strength/Diamond amulet spawn in edgeville
[b]Commands:[/b] ::stuck ::say ::spree (Username) ::wild (How many people in the wild) ::pkp (How many pk points you have) ::setstat statname 40 (Might remove this due to the ease of the exp rate). (Max you can set your stats is 40, you can also reduce your stats any less than 40 if you want it higher, you must train).
[IMG]http://img30.imageshack.us/img30/3715/88076004.png[/img] [IMG]http://img692.imageshack.us/img692/3039/75163976.png[/img] There will be PkPoints - I'm not sure what to do with these yet though. [IMG]http://img30.imageshack.us/img30/550/60422259.png[/img] On the Left there is a Magical Portal leading to 3 places, on the Right it is showing the reduced size of the wilderness [IMG]http://img17.imageshack.us/img17/4985/96068602.png[/img] This Image shows a party hat loot after killing someone, as in everytime you kill someone you get a chance to get 1 item randomly out of 300 or so items. This was just a test. It won't be dropping party hats. [IMG]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/3428/27337997.png[/img] The Wilderness [Thanks to OldSkoolRsc for making the Map] [img]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/1432/easyrscwildmap.jpg[/img]
[b]Starting Equipment:[/b] 10k 1 Iron 2-handed Sword To obtain money/items you can either train, or pk.
Pking Rewards(Chances to get a good item on drop): You can get Rune Items, crappy items, and such. It depends on random luck.
[b]Wilderness?:[/b] The wilderness has been reduced to half its size due to the low population of the RSC Scene, only the wilderness from edgville to the north exist. Except P2P wild which has been removed as well. I remembered a server called "Piru Online", so I added like a "Tree Box" in edgeville some what like they did. Only idea I took from them.
[b]Training Spots:[/b] Basically Edgeville Dungeon & The wilderness Fire Giants are located far back in edgeville Dungeon they drop rune armor quite often, but not to often since we want a value on items or pking would get boring quite quick. (Remember if you don't like training, you can always try and pk for chances at rune drops).
[b]Updates[/b] 1. Fixed the Random Item dropping with dueling. 2. Fixed a few bugs with the Random Dropping System again. 3. Added another portal in edge so its more noticeable. 4. Changed some NPC's that weren't meant suppose to be in certain areas. 5. Fixed the Players in view crash (I believe, would need to test it.) 6. Added PkPoint Exchanger for Swordfish 7. MasterFisher now gives lobsters instead. 8. Small chance to get a rare drop while pking. 9. A lot of other small things which I forget what they are.
Other Updates: 1. Added some MySql to the server 2. Added An Online Counter 3. Added a Image to show how many people are online(PHP) 4. Some Other small things and fixes.. 5. (Soon to be done, automatically teleporting). 6. Added a lastDied method for the portals, (80 seconds to use the portal after death) 7. Added some PkPoint farming protection. (Will need to improve) 8. Added some Client-Side protection, not like it will do much but eh. 9. EXP RATE?
Other Updates: 1. Fixed Shops 2. Added a lot of new training spots(Since I removed them all in the beginning). 3. More NPC's in wild where they are suppose to be, aggressive ones. 4. Fixed pking, it use to use the 'Follow' method and just follow them basically like a autocatcher 5. Increased magic runes from 10000 to 50000 in the shops. 6. Fixed a few other bugs (Small ones) 7. Fixed a corruption bug, which made some peoples file erase. (Well only happened to 1 person, think I fixed it.) 8. Working on a webclient (Currently failing since I'm doing it incorrectly, but I'll fix her up.) 9. Working on a website, might buy a domain called - pkscapef2p.info (or something similar), I'm not sure right now. Other Updates: 1. Added ::buy, EX: ::buy air 1000, ::buy bronzearr 1000 (Only applies to runes and bronze arrows.) 2. added ::wildy (Shows border pkers, what levels, and how many are in the wilderness, and how many of that level. 3. Tweaked the random drop ratio 4. Added new things to the PkP Exchange [b]Updates will now be posted on the [URL=http://pkscapef2p.sytes.net]PkScapeF2P Classic[/URL][/b] [/center]

item.title: PkScape F2P - Fast Rates - New things - Back Online Right now!
item.dc:creator: @The_Djinn The Djinn
item.description:
@The_Djinn wrote:

[quote=“nacional, post:81, topic:414293”][quote author=The Djinn link=topic=516254.msg3755207#msg3755207 date=1316384066]

I wanna say the reason such a low count is there is nothing to do when people reach flats, noone wants to farm for the same shit or
wait and check every once in a while for people pking.

We could lower the EXP rate so it will take a bit longer and more low levels will go F2P pking, does 50x Sound good
[/quote]

no don’t add filler, add content. besides most people are already are flats but can’t be assed staring at the portal for someone to come by.[/quote]
Don’t add filler? What do you mean. I’ll add content, but remember this is F2P pking server. So what kind of content needs to be in?
There is
K/D Ratio
K/D Website
Killing Spree
A lot of things

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @The_Djinn The Djinn
item.description:
@The_Djinn wrote:

[quote=“nacional, post:76, topic:414293”]I wanna say the reason such a low count is there is nothing to do when people reach flats, noone wants to farm for the same shit or
wait and check every once in a while for people pking.[/quote]
We could lower the EXP rate so it will take a bit longer and more low levels will go F2P pking, does 50x Sound good?

Also here is a suggestion I’m making tell me if you would like it.
http://pkscapef2p.tk/pk/viewtopic.php?pid=110

Once Runescape Classic dies down again I’m sure we’ll get players since everyone is playing that currently. I’m trying to give everyone what they want in a Pk Server. So it will grow sooner or later
